Regulation Name(s): Respiratory Viral Panel Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay
Specimen Container(s): Nasopharyngeal swab (various types, e.g., Copan 168C, Copan FloQ, polyester/aluminum shaft, flocked nylon/plastic shaft)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Idaho Technology FilmArray Respiratory Panel multiplexed nucleic acid test system for rapid detection of multiple respiratory viral pathogens from nasopharyngeal swab specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: Multiplexed nucleic acid test for simultaneous qualitative detection and identification of respiratory viral nucleic acids in nasopharyngeal swabs from individuals suspected of respiratory tract infection, identifying Adenovirus, Coronaviruses (HKU1, NL63), Human Metapneumovirus, Influenza A (H1, H3, 2009 H1), Influenza B, Parainfluenza virus 3, Human Rhinovirus/Enterovirus, and Respiratory Syncytial Virus, to aid diagnosis in conjunction with other clinical and epidemiological information.
